VUPShionMod:InvestigationFinFunnel.NAME: Scouting Funnel
DESCRIPTION: Current Upgrade: #b%d . NL At the start of each turn, deal #b%d Damage to a random enemy and trigger its passive ability. NL #yPassive: Apply #b%d #yBleeding . NL (Except #yStarting #yLevel , its passive becomes more effective after every #b3 upgrades.)

VUPShionMod:GravityFinFunnel.NAME: Gravity Funnel
DESCRIPTION: Current Upgrade: #b%d . NL At the start of each turn, deal #b%d Damage to a random enemy and trigger its passive ability. NL #yPassive: Grant #b%d #yBlock . NL (Except #yStarting #yLevel , its passive becomes more effective after every #b3 upgrades.)

VUPShionMod:PursuitFinFunnel.NAME: Pursuing Funnel
DESCRIPTION: Current Upgrade: #b%d . NL At the start of each turn, deal #b%d Damage to a random enemy and trigger its passive ability. NL #yPassive: Apply #b%d #yPursued . NL (Except #yStarting #yLevel , its passive becomes more effective after every #b3 upgrades.)
